name: Son, go eat soup! (demo)
description:
Son, go eat soup! is a fun physics-based 3D platformer about passing levels against the clock. You play as a boy who was called by his mother to eat! Can you run before the soup gets cold?

Features 🔥
  • Throw things, grab onto walls 😁
  • Play with physics 💪
  • Cool procedural animation 🤪
  • 7 levels to run ✅
  • 11 items in locations to find 🏀
  • Your BRO on the playground 🧍
  • Have your own cozy playground 🤩
  • Cool visuals ✨
  • Play with your pets on the playground🐥
  • Simply Relax ⭐
  • Cool music 🎵
Control🎮
  • Move - WASD 🦵
  • Jump & Get Up - Space 🔺
  • Reach/Grab Left - Left Mouse 🤚
  • Reach/Grab Right - Right Mouse ✋
  • Reach Height - Mouse Up & Down
  • Punch Left -Q 🤜💥
  • Punch Right - E 💥🤛
  • Camera zoom - Mouse Wheel 🎥
  • Volume (-/+) - V/ G 🔊

Find and activate items in the levels and they will appear in your playground!

Have a nice time! 😉

As this is a demo version, some mechanics or content might not function as intended.
